summary: An improved version of my old mod but this requires the DLC files. All spells have been completed and new spells are added. Hope you enjoy and you feedback will help me improve my mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][color=#0000ff]H[/color][/b][b][color=#0000ff]ey guys,[/color]
[/b][/size]
Nice seeing you again and thank you for the support. I thought of adding this to my old mod
page itself but the newer version has more changes and requires the DLC too. So
posted as a new mod. Again for easy find all spells contain a prefix Dovahh.

Also all spells have been revised and compiled as an single esp. Spell Books are added
so you can now learn from them and it is put in a chest at Helgen the cell in
which you enter with Hadvar. Video on working will be added soon.

[u][b][color=#ff7700][size=4][center]SPELLS[/center][/size][/color][/b][/u]
 
[b][size=3]Dovahh Chaos[/size][/b]- This spell will cloud the judgement of the opponents. But unlike the fury spell this does not
have any resist value and act on any opponent. Also they won’t consider this
spell as hostile one.

[size=3][b]Dovahh Cyclone[/b][/size]-This spell will launch a cyclone which will sweep away the opponents and damages them.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Essence Drain[/size][/b]-This spell on hitting the opponents will paralyze them and continuously drain their
health.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Ice Spike[/size][/b]-This spell will launch a series of ice spikes in rapid sessions at the target.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Lightning Fury[/size][/b]-This spell will create lightning which chains from opponent to opponent which is a
concentrated effect .( A mix of sparks and chain lightning )Also the
disintegration effect is removed.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Leech Beam[/size][/b]-This will launch a beam at the target which continously drains the health, magicka and
stamina from the target. Useful for hitting bigger tanks like giants ,mammoths,dragons and Boss fights.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Draugr overlord[/size][/b]-This will conjure a draugr overlord which uses a one handed ebony sword and also
uses fire breath ,Unrelenting force shout and ice cloak spells. Overall good support. (Twin perk supported)

[b][size=3]Dovahh Servant[/size][/b]-This will raise any dead one to fight for you except dragons .Also level cap is removed
so have fun raising giants and even powerful ones(twin perk supported)

[b][size=3]Dovahh Rapid Arrow[/size][/b]-This is similar to dovahh ice spike but fires spectral deadric rated arrows continuously.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Silent Dart[/size][/b]-This spell launches a spectral arrow which when fired does not considered as hostile. Good
for sneaky types and Assasins.

[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=4][center][/center][center]Lesser Powers[/center][/size][/color]
[/u][/b]
[b][size=3]Dovahh Retreat[/size][/b]-This gives the mist form power which the vampire lord has as a lesser power to the user. Also
increased invisibility and muffle effect and the regeneration is more than usual rate. Recharge time is removed.

[b][size=3]Dovahh Wrath[/size][/b]-Just the Power of dunmer converted to lesser power.Range and power is increased. Good for
strolling in forests without drawing weapons each time a bear or wolf annoys
us.
author: PradeepToretto
